title: Add input validation and error handling
description: Add robust input validation for all API endpoints. Validate status (open/in_progress/closed/blocked/awaiting), priority (0-4), type (task/bug/feature/epic/chore), labels (array). Return consistent error JSON with error message and code. Handle JSON parse errors gracefully. Use proper HTTP status codes: 200 OK, 201 Created, 204 No Content, 400 Bad Request, 401 Unauthorized, 403 Forbidden, 404 Not Found, 422 Unprocessable Entity.
